briefTitle: Safety of DTPa-IPV/Hib & DTPa-HBV-IPV/Hib, Followed by DTPa-IPV/Hib Vaccine in Infants Who Received Hepatitis B Vaccine
officialTitle: Assess Safety & Reactogenicity of DTPa-IPV/Hib Vaccine Admnd at 3 & 4 Mths & DTPa-HBV-IPV/Hib Vaccine Admnd at 5 Mths, Followed by DTPa-IPV/Hib Vaccine at 18 Mths in Infants Who Received hepatitisB Vaccine at Birth & at One Month of Age
summary: To assess the safety and reactogenicity of the DTPa-HBV-IPV/Hib vaccine and DTPa-IPV/Hib vaccine. This DTPa-IPV/Hib vaccine given at 3 and 4 months of age is co-administered with GSK Biologicals' rotavirus vaccine or Placebo. The Protocol Posting has been updated in order to comply with the FDA Amendment Act, Sep 2007.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Reporting Any Solicited Local Symptoms
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: During the 4-day (Days 0-3) post-vaccination period following each dose and across doses
